errors.error_description: The command to build the local documentation is `make docs`, which is incorrect. The correct command specified in the Makefile is `make html`.
correction_candidates: To locally build the documentation, enter the `doc` folder and enter `make html` in terminal.
To locally build the documentation, run `sphinx-build -b html doc doc/_build` from the root directory.
To locally build the documentation, enter the `doc` folder and enter `make` in terminal.
To locally build the documentation, enter the `doc` folder and run the `build.sh` script.
errors.golden_answer: To locally build the documentation, enter the `doc` folder and enter `make html` in terminal.
